divs: Sighting Details For the past 5 or 6 years ive been seeing and taking pics of what appears to be a fixed star in the sky that's not moving but when i take pics of it i get something thats either serpant-like or gyrating loops with Orbs present.The first set of pics i took 5 years ago were taken in my backyard in Modesto,ca.Something told me to get a digital and take pics so i did.The gyrating or sometimes serpant looking UFO pics appear gold in color while the more recent one's Sept.2007 appear silver.Plus the UFO in Sept.2007 first appeared as a huge ball of white light in the east but when my girlfriend took the pics it didnt look like a ball of light but again something gyrating or making images in the sky.No these were not planes flying overhead in 2002 since it took the UFO all evening until late at night to finally cross the sky and then begin to descend as if to land(you can see this in the Photos)I have lots of pics a couple of hundred of them...Interestingly the hugh ball of light which began to appear in the eastern sky at about 4:30 am and lasted until daylight showed itself during the muslims Holy Days of Ramadan(Sept. 26-29-2007).I believe that the UFOs are skywriting in order to send messages to those below and who are smart enough to figure it out.I have decoded some of the images i believe they are using an ancient Sumerian language...
Summary: star-like,spheres and a big ball of light
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Modesto
There were no other sightings in Modesto on or around September 27th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
